reviews.review_msg: Prof Northwood genuinely cares about her students. The course is pretty heavy, and she tries her best to teach you everything you need to know for the exams. If you want to do well in the course, study the Wiley questions, her lecture slides, and the tutorial questions.

dr northwood was an amazing prof!! she's so sweet and kind. all her exam questions were straight from Wiley so defs recommend purchasing it! she told what to study exactly on review days and told what her harder questions will ask. 10/10 would take another class w her

Dr. Northwood is one of the most passionate professors I have had. She obviously loves what she teaches, she is so sweet, and explains concepts very clearly relating it to real world situations. Her slides are way more detailed than her lectures so go to class to save the work.

Used the practice exams to prep for the real exams and got an A+ in the course.  Though, she said she'll make the course harder in the future.  Flips through a lot of slides, but tells you what's going to be on the test.  Was moody first few times I spoke to her, but when she saw I worked hard and was doing well, was much better after that.

Very knowledgeable professor and enthusiastic about the material. Told you what topics would be on exam at end of every powerpoint. Used textbook for background info and used some questions on exam. Funny in class - talked about Jersey Shore! Helpful when you asked questions. Great class overall, but she said in the future she would make it harder!
